query:
SELECT 
  'concorrentes' as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT mercadoId) as mercados_ids
FROM concorrentes 
WHERE projectId = 330001
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads' as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT mercadoId) as mercados_ids
FROM leads 
WHERE projectId = 330001
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'produtos' as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as mercados_ids
FROM produtos 
WHERE projectId = 330001
